article_title: Businesses, Patients Feel Marketplaces’ Ripple Effect
article_text:
As the Affordable Care Act moves toward its third year of full implementation, the ripple effects of change stemming from the law and its signature marketplaces are being felt in almost every corner of the health-care system.

Consumers this week start signing up for new coverage on the marketplaces, one of the most high-profile changes the law has brought to the health-care industry. But the ACA is also helping to reshape everything from how hospitals get paid to the employment of doctors, who are increasingly working for...
